titleStmt.title: A meditation for the thirtieth day of January, the anniversary of the murther and martyrdom of K. Charles the I. The best of kings, of husbands, of fathers, and of men, who was decolated [sic] on that day, Anno 1648, and in the four and twentieth year of His Sacred Majesties most gracious reign.
titleStmt.author: Rementería y Fica, Mariano de.

notesStmt.note: "Written and wept by M. de R. of the Middle Temple ... "--Colophon.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
